fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Healthy: When you have 5 HP, you have a hand space of 6.
- Natural: If the players next to you both have 4 or more HP, you will draw an extra card at the end of every phase.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Healing: Play a Reforged Heal! on someone. [2 uses, 2 CD, UOR2, Post-Mortem]
- Cleansing: Play a Reforged Cleanse! on someone. [2 uses, 2 CD, UOR2, Post-Mortem]
- Revitalize: Choose a non-King player. If they die from non-event causes in this phase, they will live on 1 HP instead, with all status effects still applied. [1 use, Unique, UOR3, LOR6]
